timeline.message: feat: Select provider config in distribution.
fix: Check if config id is set.
feat: Select provider config in Job.
feat: Include config name for project selection.
fix: Find the provider config with Global context.
test: Fix the test with the save actions.
feat: Lookup emails based on provider config name.

timeline.author: gkillough

timeline.bodyText: Should we validate if configId is a number?
timeline.author: gkillough

replies.bodyText: If a configId isn't a number then something is very wrong. I feel it should break in that case.
replies.author: bamandel

replies.bodyText: If someone is using REST calls, configId may not be a number.
replies.author: gkillough

timeline.bodyText: Could this be converted to a stream?
timeline.author: bamandel
bamandel

timeline.bodyText: Why are we not just returning the Optional globalModel? What is the purpose of the isPresent check?
timeline.author: jamesrichard91

timeline.message: refactor: Eliminate an extra line of code.
